app_title: Mental Health Data Analysis + AI Chat
app_description: This platform supports CSV file upload for visualization and analysis, and allows interactive Q&A with Gemini AI.
expander_numeric_viz: üìà Click to view numerical column visualization
warning_no_numeric_cols: No numerical columns available for visualization in this dataset.
expander_categorical_viz: üìä Click to view categorical column distribution
info_no_cat_cols: No categorical columns available for analysis in this dataset.
info_check_csv_format: Please ensure you have uploaded a valid CSV file with correct encoding.
info_upload_csv: Please upload a CSV file to start analysis.
warning_ai_unavailable: ‚ö†Ô∏è Gemini AI Assistant is currently unavailable due to invalid API key or model loading failure.
info_check_api_key: Please check Gemini model status in the sidebar and the API key setup instructions above.
ai_prompt: You can ask the AI assistant any question!
gemini_thinking: Gemini is thinking... Please wait a moment
error_gemini_no_response: ‚ùå Gemini failed to generate a valid response.
info_content_policy: This might be due to content policy violation or internal model error. Please try a different question.
warning_api_or_network_policy: This might be due to an invalid API key, network issues, or content policy violations.
info_check_api_and_policy: Please check your API key settings and ensure your question complies with Google's usage guidelines.
warning_empty_query: Please enter a question before submitting!
error_chat_init_failed: ‚ùå Chat session failed to initialize, cannot send message.
error_model_not_available: ‚ùå Model '{model_name}' is not available or does not support generateContent.
info_check_api_or_try_other: Please check your API key permissions, regional restrictions, or try another model.
error_api_connection: ‚ùå Unable to connect to Gemini API or list models:
info_check_network_or_api: Please check your network connection or if your API key is valid.
warning_api_key_not_provided: API key not provided, AI chat functionality will be disabled.
error_api_key_not_found: ‚ùå Error: Gemini API key not found!
api_key_setup_guide: To enable the AI chat assistant, please set up your Gemini API key as follows:
api_key_guide_1: **Get your key:** Go to Google AI Studio ([aistudio.google.com/app/apikey](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)) to obtain your Gemini API key.
api_key_guide_2_local_a: In your Streamlit project folder, create a subfolder named **`.streamlit`**.
api_key_guide_2_local_b: Inside the `.streamlit` folder, create a file named **`secrets.toml`**.
api_key_guide_2_local_c: Open `secrets.toml` and add the following content (replace `YOUR_ACTUAL_GEMINI_API_KEY` with your actual key):
api_key_guide_3_cloud_a: In your Streamlit Cloud app settings, find **"Secrets"** or **"Environment variables"**.
api_key_guide_3_cloud_b: Set a new Secret with the variable name `GEMINI_API_KEY` and its value as your full API key.
api_key_guide_finish: After completing the above steps, please rerun your application.
